document.full_text: the chinese government said on tuesday it was "unhappy" with foreign support for detained artist and activist ai weiwei, after ai's detention last week sparked an outcry from washington and other western governments.
document.title: china "unhappy" with foreign support for detained artist ai
lines_and_colors: the chinese government said on tuesday it was "unhappy" with foreign support for detained artist and activist ai weiwei, after ai's detention last week sparked an outcry from washington and other western governments.
